headline: Aon Brings Together Three Mumbai Offices into a New Corporate Location to Drive Innovation and Client Value
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, announced that it is combining its three existing Mumbai offices into a single, modern corporate location at One Unity Centre in Lower Parel, Mumbai. The new office brings together approximately 450 colleagues in a purpose–built shared environment designed to strengthen innovation and deliver greater value to clients across Aon's Risk Capital and Human Capital capabilities.
